item.title: Sen. John Fetterman raises alarms with outburst at meeting with union, sources say
item.description: Pennsylvania Sen. John Fetterman was meeting recently with representatives from a teachers union when things quickly devolved

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump hails unfinished trade deal with UK
item.description: Trump and Starmer emphasized that the trade deal is not finalized.

item.title: Papal conclave live updates: Cardinal Robert Prevost becomes 1st American pope
item.description: Catholic cardinals are gathering at the Vatican to elect the successor to Pope Francis, who died on April 21.

item.title: WATCH: 14 sets of twins graduating together at California high school
item.description: The graduating class at Clovis North High School in Fresno includes 28 students who are either fraternal or identical twins.

item.title: Democrats slam DHS secretary as Noem says Abrego Garcia 'not coming back' to US
